Rules and recommendations

Constructions and reconstructions can continue. Craftspeople can come to your house as government restrictions apply only to performing services in the store. However, if you meet with workers, it is necessary to follow hygiene measures.

During the visit, everyone present should wear a face mask and keep a distance. If possible, prefer non-cash payment (transfers, card payments, etc.).

You can also build a house with self-help. Volunteering and neighbourhood assistance are allowed for urgent and necessary actions. Nevertheless, please do not abuse the rules and think about the protection of you and others. Avoid clustering of people and follow hygienic measures.
